description:
The Volumes Extension doesn't have any API Sample testing.

Please take a look at the blueprint (https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/nova-api-samples) to get instructions on how to write the tests.
title: Volumes Extension doesn't have API Sample testing

comments.content:
The Volumes Extension doesn't have any API Sample testing.

Please take a look at the blueprint (https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/nova-api-samples) to get instructions on how to write the tests.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~treinish

comments.content:
Volume extensions contains the API methods for volumes, but there  are also the API methods for Volume Attachments and Snapshots. 

Adding two other bugs to create API samples for those.

Bug 1126204
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~adalbas
